text: The 2008-09 Calgary Flames season is the team's 28th season in the National Hockey League since the franchise relocated to Calgary. == Regular Season == == Playoffs == The Flames lost to the Chicago Blackhawks 2 games to 4 in the Conference Quarter-Finals. == References == Category:2008 in ice hockey Category:2009 in ice hockey Category:National Hockey League team seasons Category:2008 in Canada Category:2009 in Canada
